S34ML01G200TFI00 128MB (NAND) :*RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CC256M16DP-DI 512MB (DDR3) :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM4366KMMLG 4x4 802.11n SoC ::- 4x [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amplifier (32dBm, 33dB, QFN) ::- 4x [[Skyworks]] SKY85201-11 (SKY15201) 2.4GHz SPDT Switch w/ LNA :*5GHz radio: 2x [[Broadcom]] BCM4366KMMLG 4x4 802.11ac SoC ::- 8x [[RFMD]] RFPA5542 5GHz Power Amplifier Module ::- 8x [[Skyworks]] SKY85605-11 (SKY15605) 5GHz SPDT Switch w/ LNA :*PCIe: ''ASMedia'' ASM1182e (2-lane, 2-port PCIe (Gen2) Switch) ===News=== *[http://www.cnet.com/products/asus-rt-ac5300u-router/ On *[http://www.theverge.com/2015/9/2/9238057/asus-rt-ac5300u-triband-wireless-router-ifa-2015 On '''TheVerge'''] (images) ===Misc=== *[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s889428 PR on '''Broadcom'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/8862/quantenna-maintains-80211ac-technology-lead-as-broadcom-and-marvell-launch-new-chipsets PR on '''AnandTech'''] ==Notes== ===Features=== *Ultra-fast 802.11ac Wi-Fi router with a combined tri-band data rate of 5334 Mbps :for low latency online gaming, smooth 4K streaming and extremely fast file-sharing. *Broadcom ''acqam'' technology boosts two 5 GHz data rates up to 4330 Mbps and :2.4GHz up to 1000 Mbps. *Tri-Band with multiple devices connected at same time. Tri-Band ''Smart Connect'' :automatically selects the fastest of the three available frequency bands for each :device, based on the deviceâ€™s speed, signal strength and how busy each band is. :8x capacity Wi-Fi with revolutionary ''MU-MIMO'' technology. *4x4 MIMO antenna design with ''AiRadar'' universal beamforming for unrivaled :multi-device performance and wireless signal range up to 500 m2. *Link aggregation supports close to 2 Gbps wired transmission for more :devices to faster access speed. *''AiProtection'' with ''Trend Micro'' with triple-strength total network security, :plus robust parental controls and privacy protection ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM47094 BCM47094] @1.4 GHz SoC (ARM Cortex A9) *WLAN: 2x 4T4R AC [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] + 1x 4T4R N [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] @800 MHz :SoC (ARM Cortex A7), 4x4 MU-MIMO, 40/80MHz, QAM-1024 :DualBand, acqam, 5GHz (2x 2165Mbps), 2.4GHz (1000Mbps) ==See also== *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
